articles.author: Norman W. Baylor
articles.title: Biden's Plan to Give Covid-19 Vaccine Boosters to All Is Premature - Barron's
articles.description: The Biden administration has a plan to give all Americans Covid-19 vaccine boosters by late September. It risks eroding trust in public-health agencies, writes Norman W. Baylor.
articles.content: About the author: Dr. Norman W. Baylor is the president and CEO of Biologics Consulting. He is the former director of the Office of Vaccines Research and Review at the Food and Drug Administration.Th… [+4996 chars]
